item.description:
World Famous Edie the Salsa Freak's
Weekend Salsa Bootcamp!

FULL IMMERSION

BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND!



Saturday, January 10th, 2009!
8 Hour Salsa Immersion!

Edie the Salsa Freak's World Famous
Men & Women All-Day
"BEGINNER" Bootcamp!

Learn to Salsa in Just 1 Day!




Sunday, January 11th, 2009!
8 Hours of SEXY Salsa Styling

Ladies' Styling & Spinning Bootcamp
GLAMOUR GIRL DAY!

Ladies, bring your dresses!
Men are FREE Today!
We need you to help the ladies out!



No partner necessary!
Grrrrreat way to meet new people!
Free Breakfast & Lunch!!

Pay in Advance and Save $30!

ALL FOR AN UNBELIEVABLE DEAL OF

$65 IN ADVANCE!* ($95 at door)


FULL Weekend for ONLY $120 IN ADVANCE!* ($140 at door)

Student Discount:
$50 in advance! $100 FULL Weekend in advance!*
(students must present ID at door)


Free Breakfast Munchies and Lunch Included!



Register Now ONLINE!
You will receive confirmation from us within 48 hours



http://www.masacoteen...

** Fee is not refundable. Should you not be able to attend, we can reimburse you in Edie dvds.

******************


More Info, Schedule, Details, and Bio Online!


http://www.masacoteen...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the people with the Masacote or Metamovements shirts. :)

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Learn to Salsa in ONE Weekend! Day 1
